Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic text (petition or letter to gods): writing on recto only, 11 ll. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Petition to Osorhapi (Serapis) and other gods. Date. year 22 Thoth of "the living Pharaohs (sic) Ptolemy", prob. Ptol. Alex. I = BC. 93. Origin. Memphis (?)".
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Memphis (Egypt) ((site suggested with doubt by Thompson's MS Catalogue))
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381202) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381202)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
